Uses of Interface
com.badlogic.gdx.ai.sched.Schedulable

  • Packages that use Schedulable 
    Package Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa  
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.sched  

    • Uses of Schedulable in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa

      Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa that implement Schedulable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PathFinderQueue<N> 

    • Uses of Schedulable in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.sched

      Subinterfaces of Schedulable in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.sched 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Scheduler
      A Scheduler works by assigning a pot of execution time among a variety of tasks, based on which ones need the time.
      Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.sched that implement Schedulable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LoadBalancingScheduler
      A LoadBalancingScheduler understands the time it has to run and distributes this time among the tasks that need to be run.
      class  PriorityScheduler
      A PriorityScheduler works like a LoadBalancingScheduler but allows different tasks to get a different share of the available time by assigning a priority to each task.
      class  SchedulerBase<T extends SchedulerBase.SchedulableRecord> 
      Methods in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.sched with parameters of type Schedulable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LoadBalancingScheduler.add(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency, int phase) 
      void PriorityScheduler.add(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency, int phase)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency and phase with priority 1.
      void Scheduler.add(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency, int phase)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency and phase
      void PriorityScheduler.add(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency, int phase, float priority)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency, phase and priority.
      void LoadBalancingScheduler.addWithAutomaticPhasing(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency and a phase calculated by a dry run of the scheduler.
      void PriorityScheduler.addWithAutomaticPhasing(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency, priority 1 and a phase calculated by a dry run of the scheduler.
      void Scheduler.addWithAutomaticPhasing(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency and a phase calculated by this scheduler.
      void PriorityScheduler.addWithAutomaticPhasing(Schedulable schedulable, int frequency, float priority)
      Adds the schedulable to the list using the given frequency and priority while the phase is calculated by a dry run of the scheduler.
